execution_plan.description: Compute the number of purchased products (order items) per customer by aggregating Order_Items joined to Orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS products_bought FROM Order_Items oi JOIN Orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Get customer gender for the customers returned in step 1 so we can aggregate purchases by gender at the application level.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
